venue.name: John Lyman Center for the Performing Arts

item.description:
Join NHCer Simone as the SCSU Theater Dept and Cresecent Players will be preforming The Rocky Horror Picture Show.

Please order your own tickets Here! (Click Here, Linked)  Unless you've had a separate conversation about it, Simone is not handling that part, you're responsible for your own ticket.

They are General Admission for $10 or $5 if a Student/Senior Plus a $1.50 "Convenience Fee".

Make Sure you select the correct Day and Time of the Show, Simone is attending the October 17th 8:00 PM performance.

The Rocky Horror Picture Show

By Richard O’Brien
Book, Music & Lyrics by Richard O’Brien
Directed and Choreographed by Larry Nye

That sweet transvestite & his motley crew did the time warp on Broadway in a 25th anniversary revival. Complete with sass from the audience, cascading toilet paper and an array of other audience participation, this deliberately kitschy rock ’n’ roll si-fi gothic is more fun than ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Simone, she will Host and will post further information (cell number, where to find) as the day aproaches.
item.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show!
